manipulations.insert_object: Insert a large, ornate, golden statue on the ground to the right of the last woman.
manipulations.remove_object: Remove the window with bars on the upper left side of the brick building.
manipulations.replace_background: Replace the sky in the background with a vibrant, colorful aurora borealis.
manipulations.weather_time_change: Change the sunny weather to a heavy rain with visible raindrops and puddles on the ground.
manipulations.reflection_shadow_edit: Add a faint reflection of the front four women on the brick wall as if it were wet.
